name: China Automotive Systems, Inc.
description: China Automotive Systems, Inc. (CAAS) is a leading manufacturer and supplier of power steering products and systems in China. Established in 2003, the company has grown to become a prominent player in the automotive parts industry, focusing on the development, production, and sale of advanced steering systems for various vehicle types, including passenger cars, commercial vehicles, and electric vehicles. CAAS's product portfolio includes hydraulic power steering systems, electronic power steering systems, and other related components, which are designed to enhance vehicle performance and safety. With a commitment to innovation, the company invests heavily in research and development to improve product efficiency, reduce weight, and provide superior steering control for an optimal driving experience. CAAS serves a diverse customer base, including major automakers in China and abroad, and is dedicated to establishing strategic partnerships to expand its market reach. The company is also making strides in the integration of smart technologies and automation into its product offerings, aligning with the global shift towards intelligent vehicles. As a publicly traded company, CAAS aims to enhance shareholder value while contributing to the growth of the automotive industry in China and globally.

faq.answer: CAAS offers hydraulic and electronic power steering systems, along with other automotive components.
